summary_md: Sweden, in the year 2024, has a per capita GDP of 54,916 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 2.84% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 8.53% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 83.31 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 95.70% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's share of global exports is 54.60% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Sweden's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 54,916 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and a significant share of global exports at 54.60% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Sweden shows an unemployment rate of 8.53% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable job market.
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Sweden is high, with usage at 95.70% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), reflecting the country's advanced digital infrastructure.
sections.health_env_md: Sweden boasts a high average life expectancy of 83.31 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), suggesting a strong health environment.
